title: No Vacancy for Love: Unconditional Feelings for a Conditional Relation...
description: A reserved boy, an extrovert girl, same college and a small town... It isn’t a love story... but a story of trust, belief, loyalty and sacrifices.Welcome to, ‘No Vacancy for Love – Unconditional feelings for a conditional Relation…’ This is a story about two youngsters– Shabd, Tanya and their friendship. It’s about a friendship that burns under the path of faith, humanity, decency and hurting decisions. It challenges the saying, ‘if you’re good to others, they are always good to you…if not today then wait for tomorrow.’
author: Anuj Shrivastava
